snippet: Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. on Tuesday sharply criticized the Boy Scouts of America’s policy as “a relic of an age of prejudice and insufficient understanding.”
abstract: Attorney General Eric H Holder Jr sharply criticizes the Boy Scouts of America’s policy that bans gay scout leaders, calling it relic of an age of prejudice and insufficient understanding.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. on Tuesday sharply criticized the Boy Scouts of America’s policy as “a relic of an age of prejudice and insufficient understanding.”

headline.main: Holder Criticizes Ban on Gay Boy Scout Leaders
headline.print_headline: Holder Criticizes Ban on Gay Boy Scout Leaders
